mapper.select:
SELECT farm_data_idx AS farmDataIdx , username AS username , company_info_idx AS companyInfoIdx , farm_data_compost AS farmDataCompost , farm_data_production AS farmDataProduction , farm_data_expected_sale AS farmDataExpectedSale , farm_data_actual_sale AS farmDataActualSale , farm_data_production_date AS farmDataProductionDate , farm_data_occurrence_sale_date AS farmDataOccurrenceSaleDate , farm_data_expected_wasted AS farmDataExpectedWasted
FROM farm_data
